title.rendered: One reason Tara and I started Owl + Sparrow

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_column_text]

MEG TAKEOVER. One of the reasons Tara and I started Owl + Sparrow because there are certain creative elements we both love. Tara is happiest behind a camera, and I’m happiest behind an iPad or paintbrush. If you need custom artwork for yourself or gifts, social media images, posters, help with branding or logos, murals, get in touch with us! – Taken from Instagram

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself.
